text: Hagi Siba kumate vahe'mo'zane, Dedani kumate vahe'mo'zane, zagore'ma keonke'zama miza hu'za atre'zama nehaza Tasisi vahe'mo'zane, maka neonse kumazmifima nemaniza vahe'mo'zanena amanage hu'za kagrikura hugahaze. Kagra sondia vaheka'aramima zamavarenka e'nanana, vahe arohu zamarenka feno zamine, silvane, goline, bulimakao afutamine, sipisipi afutamine, maka fenozmia erinaku e'nano? hu'za kantahigegahaze.
